thread.title: Genius launches new wireless graphic design tablet
thread.title_full: Genius launches new wireless graphic design tablet

author: Deccan
title: Genius launches new wireless graphic design tablet
text:
Deccan Chronicle | September 09, 2015, 15.36 pm The Genius MousePen also features 29 programmable keys Genius has announced the launch of its new wireless graphic design – the MousePen-i608x. Using advanced 2.4GHz wireless technology, the mousepen tablet connects to laptops/PC’s via a USB receiver, offering mobility without any interference. Aimed at graphic-design professionals, art teachers and students, the mousepen provides wireless freedom to paint, draw, write, and edit.
The tablet offers an area of 6” X 8” to draw and write with a resolution of 2560 LPI. The high-performance pen features 1024 pressure levels, making brush strokes thicker or thinner depending on how hard the pen is pressed, mimicking traditional painting. It also comes with a clip which makes carrying it easy.
The Genius MousePen –i608x also comes with 29 programmable keys for customized Office and Internet shortcuts, resulting in higher working efficiency. The Genius MousePen –i608x comes bundled with two useful software: Paintnet – a powerful image and photo editing software that bring the joy of drawing and Pen Toolbar - all in one annotation software which helps in making notes and signing documents in Word, Excel, PowerPoint and e-mails.
The Genius MousePen –i608x is priced at Rs 4,500 and will be available on Flipkart, Snapdeal, Amazon and eBay.
